languages.text: "Эмоции, искаженные влиянием варпа, едки и омерзительны на вид. Архивраг нарочно извращает цвета, делает их невыносимыми... для тех, кто еще не погряз в скверне".

"Emotions distorted by the influence of the warp are corrosive and repulsive to behold. The Archenemy purposely perverts the colours, making them unbearable to look at for anyone not yet steeped in corruption."
languages.original_text: "Эмоции, искаженные влиянием варпа, едки и омерзительны на вид. Архивраг нарочно извращает цвета, делает их невыносимыми... для тех, кто еще не погряз в скверне".

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那些被亚空间扭曲的情绪会变得令人作呕，充满了腐蚀性。那些被混沌大敌刻意扭曲的色彩，在那些未被腐化的人眼中看来，简直是不堪入目。”
languages.original_text: "Emotions distorted by the influence of the warp are corrosive and repulsive to behold. The Archenemy purposely perverts the colours, making them unbearable to look at for anyone not yet steeped in corruption."

traits.locale_text: “那些被亚空间扭曲的情绪会变得令人作呕，充满了腐蚀性。那些被混沌大敌刻意扭曲的色彩，在那些未被腐化的人眼中看来，简直是不堪入目。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Déformées par l'influence du Warp, les émotions sont aussi corrosives que répugnantes. Les couleurs ainsi dénaturées par le Grand Ennemi deviennent insoutenables, sauf pour ceux qui ont déjà sombré dans la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "Emotions distorted by the influence of the warp are corrosive and repulsive to behold. The Archenemy purposely perverts the colours, making them unbearable to look at for anyone not yet steeped in corruption."

traits.locale_text: « Déformées par l'influence du Warp, les émotions sont aussi corrosives que répugnantes. Les couleurs ainsi dénaturées par le Grand Ennemi deviennent insoutenables, sauf pour ceux qui ont déjà sombré dans la corruption. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Las emociones distorsionadas por el influjo de la disformidad son corrosivas y de aspecto repugnante. El Archienemigo pervierte la coloración de forma intencionada, haciendo que ofenda a la vista de cualquiera que no se haya sumido en la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "Emotions distorted by the influence of the warp are corrosive and repulsive to behold. The Archenemy purposely perverts the colours, making them unbearable to look at for anyone not yet steeped in corruption."

traits.locale_text: «Las emociones distorsionadas por el influjo de la disformidad son corrosivas y de aspecto repugnante. El Archienemigo pervierte la coloración de forma intencionada, haciendo que ofenda a la vista de cualquiera que no se haya sumido en la corrupción».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「<歪み>の影響でひずんだ感情は目も当てられない腐食と不快を呼び起こします。渾沌の勢力が意図的に色をゆがめるのです、まだ腐敗に浸っていない者が直視できないように」
languages.original_text: "Emotions distorted by the influence of the warp are corrosive and repulsive to behold. The Archenemy purposely perverts the colours, making them unbearable to look at for anyone not yet steeped in corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「<歪み>の影響でひずんだ感情は目も当てられない腐食と不快を呼び起こします。渾沌の勢力が意図的に色をゆがめるのです、まだ腐敗に浸っていない者が直視できないように」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Vom Einfluss des Warps verzerrte Emotionen sind ätzend und widerwärtig anzusehen. Der Erzfeind pervertiert bewusst die Farben. Er macht es für jeden, der noch nicht von der Korruption zerfressen ist, unerträglich, sie anzusehen."
languages.original_text: "Emotions distorted by the influence of the warp are corrosive and repulsive to behold. The Archenemy purposely perverts the colours, making them unbearable to look at for anyone not yet steeped in corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Vom Einfluss des Warps verzerrte Emotionen sind ätzend und widerwärtig anzusehen. Der Erzfeind pervertiert bewusst die Farben. Er macht es für jeden, der noch nicht von der Korruption zerfressen ist, unerträglich, sie anzusehen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Emotions distorted by the influence of the warp are corrosive and repulsive to behold. The Archenemy purposely perverts the colours, making them unbearable to look at for anyone not yet steeped in corruption."

languages.text: "Öteboyutun nüfuzuyla çarpıtılmış duygular, çürütücü ve tiksindiricidir. Şerbaşı, renkleri kasıtlı olarak saptırıp henüz yozluğa düşmeyenler onlara baktığında gözlerine dayanılmaz bir acı aşılar."
languages.original_text: "Emotions distorted by the influence of the warp are corrosive and repulsive to behold. The Archenemy purposely perverts the colours, making them unbearable to look at for anyone not yet steeped in corruption."
